## SimpleProduct.new\_to\_date property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> The field should not be used on the storefront.
> 

The end date for new product listings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
new_to_date?: Maybe<Scalars['String']>;
```
